title: No results when searching via Package view selection and dialog
description: When searching via Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed.
OB: Currently, when searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are shown. Only the search via context menu in the packages view is working.
EB: Expected behavior is that the search via Package view selection and dialog should display results similar to the search via context menu in the packages view.
SR: To reproduce the issue, perform the following steps: 1. Open the Package view in the application. 2. Right-click on a package or class and select 'Search'. 3. In the search dialog, enter a search term for declarations. 4. Observe that no search results are displayed.
